com.jcodeing.kmedia.widget.android

Class SwipeProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcodeing.kmedia.widget.android.SwipeProgressBar

  • public final class SwipeProgressBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom progress bar that shows a cycle of colors as widening circles that overdraw each other. When finished, the bar is cleared from the inside out as the main cycle continues. Before running, this can also indicate how close the user is to triggering something (e.g. how far they need to pull down to trigger a refresh).

    • Method Detail

      • setColorScheme

        public void setColorScheme(int color1,
                           int color2,
                           int color3,
                           int color4)
        Set the four colors used in the progress animation. The first color will also be the color of the bar that grows in response to a user swipe gesture.
        Parameters:
        color1 - Integer representation of a color.
        color2 - Integer representation of a color.
        color3 - Integer representation of a color.
        color4 - Integer representation of a color.

      • setTriggerPercentage

        public void setTriggerPercentage(float triggerPercentage)
        Update the progress the user has made toward triggering the swipe gesture. and use this value to update the percentage of the trigger that is shown.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start showing the progress animation.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop showing the progress animation.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        Return whether the progress animation is currently running.

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)

      • drawCircle

        private void drawCircle(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                        float cx,
                        float cy,
                        int color,
                        float pct)
        Draws a circle centered in the view.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas to draw on
        cx - the center x coordinate
        cy - the center y coordinate
        color - the color to draw
        pct - the percentage of the view that the circle should cover

        public void setBounds(int left,
                      int top,

        Set the drawing bounds of this SwipeProgressBar.
